subject: Sheldon here
body:
Get back to me at the number below and hear how you too can be generating $15OO-$3OOO each and every day for returning phone calls.

Oh the sun is shining and things are better each day.

I get to stay home and relax on my porch while I simply return phone calls
each day. This can be you also if you want it to be.

The potential to generate up to $3OOO each week is there
so pick up that telephone and call my information line.

800-691-4552




Get back to me via Madison2Madison@comprehensivecoaching.com if not lnterested





The journey of a thousand miles begins with a broken fan belt and a leaky tire.
